question: What stage is your business currently in?
What industry is your business in?
Please describe what kinds of datasets you need to use for your chosen AI technique. There are certain data governance and data quality requirements that apply to the datasets you will use.
Please describe the data you will use as input for your training, validation, and/or testing dataset. You can describe the different source datasets that you plan to use.
Have you developed a comprehensive privacy policy that complies with the Privacy Act 1988 and the Australian Privacy Principles (APPs)?
Is your privacy policy displayed on your company website and easily accessible to users?
Have you implemented data encryption to protect personal and sensitive information?
Do you have secure access controls in place to prevent unauthorized access to data?
Do you conduct regular security audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities?
Are you ensuring the secure storage and handling of all data, whether it is stored on-site or in the cloud?
Have you developed a data breach response plan that details the steps to be taken in the event of a data breach?
Have you trained your staff on data breach protocols and reporting requirements under the Notifiable Data Breaches (NDB) scheme?
Have you assessed the potential biases in your AI algorithms?
Do you have a process for monitoring and mitigating any identified biases in your AI system?
Do you ensure transparency in how your AI system makes decisions?
Are you aware of the relevant AI regulations and guidelines in your industry and region?
Do you regularly review and update your AI system to comply with new regulations?
Do you have a designated compliance officer or team responsible for AI compliance?
